content: If he tries to shoot out various wing-tip projectiles at you, don't panic and just use your staff spin to knock them all aside.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
If he tries to shoot out various wing-tip projectiles at you, don't panic and just use your staff spin to knock them all aside.
